EmailTemplate.name: OHR - Final Rejection Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Forms__c.Form_Type_Name__c} Form: Rejected! Record ID: {!Forms__c.Form_Record_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your submission of {!Forms__c.Form_Type_Name__c}, Record ID {!Forms__c.Form_Record_Name__c} Form has been rejected!
Please review these comments from your approver:
{!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Please go to https://forms.epa.gov. Then click on "My Forms" and look for the form with the Record ID {form ID number}. Click "Open Form" and address the above comments and resubmit your form.
